table.name: vtiger_clienttypes
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_clienttypes` ( `clienttypesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `client_types` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`clienttypesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_clienttypescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_clienttypescf` ( `vtiger_clienttypescf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_clienttypescf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
